about_the_game:
This game is a parody created under the influence of the hype of crypto airdrops in clickers. In this game you also need to poke on the screen in anticipation of a reward. Click on a coin to mine coins, sell coins for other coins, buy video cards to automate mining. Buy chests for mined coins to try to get new types of coins or look for them in the community on the trading platform or by exchanging with friends.
No blockchain was used in this game.

How to play
Click on big image of coin to fill hashrate field. As soon as you fill it up you'll get a coin.
Exchange this coin In "Exchange" tab for StableCoin of MainCoin.
Buy video card for StableCoins in the "Farm" tab to automize mining process.
Buy chests in the "Shop" tab to get new Coins to mine.
Set coin to mine from your coin collection in the "Collection" tab.
Once you have mined a certain number of coins, a “halving” will occur, so the required hashrate to mine the coin will double. After several "Halvings" requred hashrate may become too hight, so try to use other coin from your coin collection(each coin has it's own "Halvings"). You can get coins from the chests in the "Shop" tab or exchange it with friends/find on market.

name: Crypto Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
